about_the_game:
Greetings, traveler!

You've been looking for the perfect MMO world for so long, when a truly perfect and wonderful world is always in your head!


MMO RPG DEV


Let's build your own MMO RPG world!

It all starts with the lands. Create islands and continents, mountains and lakes. Gain full control over your lands with the terraforming tool and unlimited creative space.



It's time to build cities.. or forest camps. Fishing villages.. or destroyed settlements. A lot of objects suitable for any ideas. But it's not just the scenery! Each building or object can be interactive, and only you can decide what exactly it will do.



Your world is ready to open its doors to thousands of players! But what classes will they play? And what skills will they have? You have the answers to these questions, and most importantly, you have unlimited power to do it!



And now let's breathe life into this wonderful.. or a dangerous world! Come up with which enemies the local heroes will have to fight. Will it be monsters, animals or people? What kind of weapons do they use?



Every single aspect of your world lends itself to deep customization. Everything you've seen in traditional MMORPG games is possible in your world. You are limited only by your own imagination.

Features
- Unlimited amount of highly customizable lands
- Terraforming
- Unlimited character classes with unique equipment and abilities
- Deep skill editor with lots of different effects
- Advanced AI to realize skill combos and team-fight tactics
- Fully customizable enemies
- Deep designing equipment, weapons, consumable items
- Crafting, gathering, fishing and trading
- Unlimited fractions or races
- All types of PvP and RvR
- Raid Bosses
- Dungeons
- Sieges

Add to your Wishlist now!

And follow the Development on YouTube @Elindery

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years

name: MMO RPG DEV Tycoon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years

short_description: Let's build your own MMO RPG world!
